pulltitle: Offer to install Firefox for Android rather than Firefox beta
pullsbody:
Currently users who do not have Firefox installed are offered to install a compatible run time, and in the play store they reach Firefox Beta. 
But apk factory apks work with Firefox for Android also. For someone who has never used Firefox on their phone, it is better to install the production version rather than beta.
pull_repo_desc: This is the APK template for Open Web Apps on Android.
pull_commit_message: FENNEC_PACKAGE changed to firefox from beta

pull_repo_desc: This is the APK template for Open Web Apps on Android.
pull_commit_message:
Check that the user has a web runtime available, and if not offer to download from the play store.

When it comes back, check that the web runtime has been installed, then launch the app.
